title: Software Engineer
description:
Who you are
At least 1 year professional software development experience with TypeScript and ReactJS
Desirable
The ideal candidates for this role would value the rhythm of delivery of the team, getting energy from a rapid cadence of incremental delivery, getting small changes in the hands of customers, observing its impact and iterating
Weâ€™re looking for someone who is excited to provide customer value
What the job involves
This role can be described as being the engineering muscle powering the Growth engine of the business. HeliosX has millions of potential customers visiting our sites every year, your role (along with your Engineering colleagues and Product counterparts) is to increase the number of people that go on to purchase products on our array of healthcare sites
This is a growth-focused role, but you will be part of a wider engineering organisation, improving things as we go and making pragmatic choices reacting to opportunities as they arise
Build front-end experiences that delight our users, and drive engagement / purchases on our sites
Adapt our existing customer experiences and add experiments (A/B tests) with the intent of increasing the rate that people successfully convert into being a customer
Attract new customers - be it through creating landing pages for our paid advertisements, or SEO improvements, or any other idea that your team believes will attract more customers to the product
Alongside the other Front-End engineers, you will have a hand in guiding the way we do front-end engineering at HeliosX
